description: Yeehaa delves into the fragmentation of the internet, equating it to the Earth's tectonic activities and calling for 'ecosystem architecture.' This innovative approach, inspired by decentralization and regenerative design, aims to create robust and sustainable digital ecosystems through an interdisciplinary blend from philosophy to coding.
blurb: Champion of 'ecosystem architecture' for a sustainable, fragmented internet. Advocates interdisciplinary collaboration from philosophy to coding to create vibrant digital ecosystems.
